name: COVID19SuspectedInfectionICD10
title: COVID19 Suspected Infection (ICD10)
description: Given the variability in coding of diagnoses, this value set will be most useful with robust mapping of source data to the ICD10 reference terms.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Intended to support surveillance and monitoring of COVID-19 infection),(Data Element Scope: Compilation of ICD10 codes for Suspected, but not Confirmed, COVID-19 infection; Includes non-specific codes which have been commonly used in practice during the pandemic to indicate suspected COVID-19 infection (eg coronavirus infection)),(Inclusion Criteria: Suspected COVID-19 infection, including codes indicating presumed positive lab tests, known exposure with consistent signs and symptoms.),(Exclusion Criteria: Confirmed infection, Exposure without Suspected infection)
